name: Thirst for Blood v2.0
description: This is my first map DeathMatch. I am not an expert in the creation of maps, however, believe that the end result pleases the fans of Doom. Some features: 1) There is only 1 BFG and 1 PLASMA GUN in the game! 2) Put on a platform with the rune RESISTANCE. (huahuahauahuahuah) 3) I added a platform with the item RANDOM POWERUP. This last there was bullshit! ;-)
